tgt_original: na boddhā na ca boddhavyamastīha paramārthataḥ |
na tvayotpāditaḥ kaścid dharmo nāpi nirodhitaḥ |
na saṃsārātprakarṣeṇa tvayā nirvāṇamīpsitam |  śāntiste'dhigatā nātha saṃsārānaparādhitaḥ || 5 ||
na te'sti saktiḥ skandheṣu na dhātvāyataneṣu ca |  ākāśasamacittastvaṃ sarvadharmeṣu niśritaḥ || 8 ||
niraupamyastavaḥ  niraupamya namastubhyaṃ niḥsvabhāvārthavādine |  yastvaṃ dṛṣṭivipannasya lokasyaiva hitodyataḥ || 1 ||
na ca nāma tvayā kiñcid dṛṣṭaṃ bauddhena cakṣuṣā |
ekatvānyatvarahitaṃ pratiśrutkopamaṃ jagat |  saṃkrāntināśāya gataṃ buddhavān tvamanindita || 13 ||
sattvasaṃjñā ca te nātha sarvathā na pravartate |
alakṣaṇaṃ tvayā dhīraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ rūpamarūpavat |  lakṣaṇojjvalagātraśca dṛśyase rūpagocare || 16 ||
na ca rūpeṇa dṛṣṭena dṛṣṭa ityabhidhīyase |
dharmadṛṣṭyā sudṛṣṭo'si dharmatā na ca dṛśyate || 17 ||
śauṣīryo nāsti te kāyo māṃsāsthirudhiro na ca |
nāmayo nāśuciḥ kāye kṣuttṛṣṇāsambhavo na ca |
na te'sti manyanā nātha na vikalpo na ceñjanā |
nityo dhruvaḥ śivaḥ kāyastava dharmamayo jina |
